info.brief_description: One of favourite character from epic of Outcast, will has his only story.
info.description:
Yes, Based on character from Outcast which is good original character maker.

However unlike Outcast, Jason is always one of main character in this story, however since this his story alone as his story was cut short in 208#. Crossover can happen to all fictions hint why the Fan fiction Genre in here

Also in story Jason can live forever because since both has mix of kitsune and demon blood as well he can't get disease.

Only way he can die is from an sword, bow or gun or even laser weapons if we get that far in future

So you know.

He has two type of magic, Soul Magic( Informality called Dark magic) and Mana which is life-force

So what are you waiting for write something
info.pretty_title: Jason the Demon Hydra Kitsune Human
